Name: Witch girl got killed.
About the game: Witch Girl Got Killed. is a first person fantasy horror action game. Features: ∙ Your mission is to infiltrate a labyrinth that has appeared in town and destroy the labyrinth's brains. b] / The town and the labyrinth are full of monsters, and it is troublesome if the monsters find you. Run away as fast as you can. / Monsters react to footsteps and light and are especially sensitive to magic. Be careful when using it. ⋅ The play time is about 40 to 60 minutes. b] Auto-save function included. You are a magical girl trainee. You cannot use strong magic. However, you can use simple magic. In the town and in the labyrinth, you will find traces of magic circles set up by the magical girls who came before you. If you use magic on the magic circle, you can use warp. Also, while using magic, you can see the dead world. Use magic well to escape from monsters and conquer the labyrinth.　 Controls: Move : WASD Jump : Space Option setting : Tab Aim display in the center of the screen ON/OFF : R Dash mode ON/OFF : LSHIFT Action (Get/Use Item) : Left Click Item selection : Mouse wheel Flashlight ON/OFF : Right click Use/stop magic : E
